title: mm插件刷player类型怪物
author: qq1136428600
txt_content: MythicMobs插件如何设置怪物类型为player呢，不要说怪物类型直接填player

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
player怪物必须使用伪装
教程https://pluginscdtribe.github.io ... Addon-Disguise.html

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
需要安装:
LibsDisguises
添加伪装
a1:
  Type: ZOMBIE
  Display: ''
  Health: 10
  Damage: 2
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Player: '这个怪物的名字'
    Skin: 皮肤id

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
伪装插件地址https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/libs-disguises.32453/伪装插件版本
8.2.6 (1.7)
8.6.8 (1.8)或者8.6.7 (1.8)
9.0.6 (1.9)
9.1.2 (1.11)
9.5.2 (1.12.2)
最新版 (1.13)

前置插件ProtocolLib
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/
